I paid an in-face visit to @RoyBlunt's office today, for all the good that will do. https://t.co/Le9Ao0QPpd
I pleaded with them to have Roy do something. Oppose Bannon. Stop Trump. If not, we are headed straight into fascist dictatorship.
I told them "Not because he will get voted out, but because there will be no Senate. It took Hitler < 6mo to disband parliament.
I told them if Roy didn't stand up and do something about Bannon and Trump, he would be out of a job soon.
I asked if any of them voted for Steve Bannon? You know he's running show, and stated publicly he'd wanted to completely destroy the state.
The young woman at the window was very nice and listened to me patiently. Others farther back glanced up a couple times.
I did it; I walked into @RoyBlunt's local office, officially asked for a NO vote on DeVoss, then warned them there will be no Senate, soon.
